DOC.brief_summary: Patients orbital injury enter trial . Age : 20 - 70 . After obtain appropriate consent , enter either control arm reconstruction orbit do titanium mesh ( establish practice ) experimental arm reconstruction bioresorbable implant make polycaprolactone . Patients followuped 1 week , 1 month , 3 month , 6 month & 12 month . CT scan orbit perform preop , 6 month & 12 month . End point 12 month follow-up appointment . Visual acuity , range motion , enophthalmos & diplopia assess follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Reconstruction Orbit With Bioresorbable Polycaprolactone Implant
DOC.detailed_description: Patients orbital injury enter trial . Age : 20 - 70 . After obtain appropriate consent , enter either control arm reconstruction orbit do titanium mesh ( establish practice ) experimental arm reconstruction bioresorbable implant make polycaprolactone . Patients followuped 1 week , 1 month , 3 month , 6 month & 12 month . CT scan orbit perform preop , 6 month & 12 month . End point 12 month follow-up appointment . Visual acuity , range motion , enophthalmos & diplopia assess follow-up .
DOC.criteria: age : 20 70 year facial trauma orbital fracture No coexistent condition eg . diabetes , heart disease , etc
